item.title: ByteDance Cofounder Zhang Yiming Is The Richest Person In China
item.description: Zhang Yiming, founder of TikTok owner ByteDance, has overtaken beverage giant Nongfu Spring Chairman Zhong Shanshan as the richest man in China.
